ygData.subject: Re: Rez changed
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually I am kinda happy about this one.. I know for a fact I am tired of seeing all the bodies in some zones... this will help out a lot in that. just my PoV
ygData.messageBody:
Actually I am kinda happy about this one.. I know for a fact I am tired of
seeing all the bodies in some zones... this will help out a lot in that.


just my PoV of the matter...

jaxim


>From: "John Erik Maynus" <jmaynus@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Rez changed
>Date: Fri, 24 Sep 1999 11:16:00 -0400
>
>From: "John Erik Maynus" <jmaynus@...>
>
>I read on another e-mail list that on the test server they have done it
>once
>again and they are now changing rez spells. This is what I've read.
>
>Corpses that are older than 2 hours cannot be resurrected.
>Corpses that are produced from a duel cannot be resurrected after 10
>minutes.
>
>I wish Verant would just leave things alone and fix the things that need
>fixed like Plan of Fear, Rogues and things like that and stop making
>classes
>weaker.
>
>**************************
>Azor Spellbound
>Lvl 20 Human Cleric of the Rathe
>**************************
>
>>
